msg: New layout on users and conversation pages

author: norman
msg: Store the MimeMessage on extra storage and not in jms. At the moment only fs is supported (See JAMES-985)

author: mor
msg: Moved permission checking logic to service definition. Applied applications only part of my patch

author: mor
msg: Extending the <required-permissions> tag in service model such that it can contain one or more occurrence of <permission-service> tag.
This is helpful when there is a need to check more then one permission using a permission service.
Applied framework only part from my patch from jira issue OFBIZ-3632 (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3632)
